text:
$679 million in emergency aid due months ago.

A federal judge ordered Treasury 
Secretary Steven Mnuchin to distribute hundreds of millions of dollars in delayed COVID-19 relief to Native American tribes. 

https://t.co/VZ8JKyRUan via @HuffPostPol
